entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain this afternoon and ending later this afternoon. Fog patches this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
